text.p: Industry output(pct) July +11.7m/m;+8.3yr/yr (June -7.8;-0.2) Current account Jan-July -$967 million (Jan-June -$934 million)
MIT trade balance Jan-July -$1.74 bln (Jan-June -$1.45 bln)
Gross foreign debt July $27,622.9 million (June $27,535.5 million)
Net foreign debt June $14,278.9 million (May $14,390.7 million)
Budget deficit (HUF) Jan-Aug HUF 121 bln (Jan-July 102 bln)

The NBH is BBB-minus by Duff & Phelps, IBCA and Thomson BankWatch, BB-plus by S&P, BA1 by Moody's Investors Service, BBB+ by the Japan Credit Rating Agency. The NBH trade data is based on cash flow, MIT8data on customs statistics.
